readable.title: 3485816074_363cab4bff
readable.content: A man in white and red tries to stop a man with a ball . A rugby player attempts to break free of an opposing player with both teams closing in . A rugby player defends the ball against a member of the other team attempting to tackle him . A rugby player in a black and yellow uniform runs down the field while number six on the other team tries to tackle him . A rugby player in black is pushing his way through a player in red whilst carrying the ball .
